snippet: California is considering accelerating the release of some inmates while allowing others with a violent history to become inmate firefighters, under a proposal to cut prison crowding.
abstract: Proposal filed by California Gov Jerry Brown will accelerate release of some prison inmates while allowing others with violent history to become inmate firefighters; federal courts require state to outline how it intends to meet court-ordered population cap on inmates by end of 2013.
lead_paragraph: California is considering accelerating the release of some inmates while allowing others with a violent history to become inmate firefighters, under a proposal to cut prison crowding.

headline.main: California: Governor Files Proposal on Inmates
headline.print_headline: California: Governor Files Proposal On Inmates
